tool_description: The API verify the Canada Routing Numbers used to identify Bank & Branch. With this API you can find  Bank Name, Branch Name, Province Name, City Name & Address of the Bank Branch
title: Canada Routing Numbers Varification API

api_list.name: Canada Routing Number
api_list.description: Canada Routing Number is of 9 digits.  Pass the value of the rtn and get the Routing Number Information
